name: OnlinePresence
description: Online presence point for an organization or person - website, social media profiles, online platforms

properties.name: platform
properties.description: Platform or service name (website, linkedin, twitter, facebook, instagram, youtube, github, etc.)

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to the profile or page

properties.name: handle
properties.description: Username or handle on the platform (without @ symbol)

properties.name: verified
properties.description: Whether this is a verified/official account

properties.name: primary
properties.description: Whether this is the primary online presence
